body_html:
@damienmg, @lberki what do you think about being able to list multiple sources for an external source, instead of just one in bazel?

For example, one thing we could do is host a lot of the source code ourselves on say, Google storage. Unfortunately, that doesn't work for our clients in China, which is why we don't do that today. However, if we had multiple sources to choose from, bazel could iterate through them until it finds a successful source. Worthy of a feature request?

(@jart what do you think?)
